Uses of Package
asteroids

  • Classes in asteroids used by asteroids 
    Class and Description
    Asteroid
    The asteroid class is a subclass of Polygon and holds the data and methods needed to draw and move the asteroids.
    GameBoard
    Holds the information needed for creation of the game board and also is used as the main driver for the application.
    Laser
    Contains the data and instructions for movement for the lasers shot in the game.
    SpaceShip
    Holds data needed for the drawing and movement of the space ship for the game.
